articles.content: Playing Game 75 of the regular season, John Tortorella's Philadelphia Flyers (36-28-10) are home on Saturday to take on Luke Richardson's Chicago Blackhawks (21-47-5). Game time at Wells Fargo Center… [+8789 chars]

articles.author: CJ Moore
articles.title: Duke's defense squeezes Houston in Sweet 16 as Blue Devils start to rewrite the narrative - The Athletic
articles.description: Houston was college basketball's best defensive team most of the season, but in the end Friday night, Duke's defense won the game.
articles.content: DALLAS Tyrese Proctor asked Dukes analytics team this week for more video of Houston leading scorer L.J. Cryer. Proctor wanted to know his tendencies. Where he likes the ball. How he gets his shots.… [+8721 chars]
